description_template_package: A CentOS Desktop MAJOR_VERSION Packer project based on chef bento's CentOS Server settings (with the addition of the desktop GUI)
version_description: Compact CentOS Desktop ISO_VERSION image. Built from the CentOS Server image using many of the scripts that bento chef uses. See https://gitlab.com/megabyte-labs/packer/centos-desktop for more details.
